description_html:
Add a touch of fantasy to your professional interiors with Taralay Impression. The updated collection features seven new printed visuals and new modernized wood visuals with a super matte effect for a more realistic appearance. Taralay is a commercial grade heterogeneous sheet flooring in 6’6” width with a 28 mil wearlayer and available in compact and comfort backing, providing comfort underfoot and sound management properties.

Taralay Impression is treated with the 30-year proven Protecsol® Surface Treatment for a no wax for life and easy maintenance. The product is available in more than 40 high-styled, abstract design patterns in a neutral palette from grays and whites, to taupes and beiges, as well as bolder, more lively hues that allow you to create way-finding floor plans with pops of colors.
